title: (2780-267) Oeiras - N6
description: One of the calmest places we found in this area, with some cars coming and going occasionally (and more people on the weekend, it can get busy and loud). Fairly levelled. Some trees for shade. Relatively wind protected. Right at the beach, where public toilet available daytime (even in winter) plus showers in season.  Police circles frequently, so feels safe. This might be different in summer, please be mindful :)

title: () - Passeio Marítimo de Oeiras
description: Parking day and night, paid from 9h to 19h, fairly quiet, beach 100 meters.

title: (2775-604) Carcavelos - 2775 Avenida Marginal
description: Large esplanade to park and spend the night with views of Carcavelos beach. You only have to cross an avenue to be on the beach with its restaurants and bars. Very good views. There are no services. It is good to move around the area and if you are not affected by the noise of the cars that pass by on the avenue, it is a good place to spend the night.

title: () Carcavelos -
description: Parking right on the beach. During the day (from 9 a.m. to 8 p.m. paying). Shower directly at the car park. Toilets available in adjacent restaurants or public toilets from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. We stayed from Wednesday to Thursday - great view of the sea! very good wifi and beach showers available

title: (2775-604) Carcavelos - Av. Marginal
description: A very large parking lot, right on the street. In the back area under trees, there are a few quieter places. But it never gets very quiet. No prohibition signs. Beach at 100 m. With showers and toilets.

title: (2780-166) Oeiras - 33A Rua Desembargador Faria
description: Shower possible :)

title: (2775) Carcavelos - Passeio Padre Aleixo Cordeiro
description:
Dirt lot a short walk from the beach.  Plenty of room for large vans and campers.  No time limit on parking.  Parked there for a day and night.

The roundabout near the lot sees a lot of accidents.  Be mindful that the person on the inside lane may have the right of way.

title: (2775) Carcavelos -
description: We stood in the open field that night and were woken up by the heat in the bus. There were shadows here. Other campers stood with us. Here it is protected and quiet. Good for one night!

title: (2780-310) Oeiras - 17 Praceta Areais
description: Quiet place on a residence area. There are a lot of parking lots, some of them inclined. Available for large vehicles. You can even enjoy the bridge view. Continente supermarket 5 mins walking and Santo Amaro train station 8 mins walking

title: (2775) Carcavelos - Avenida Marginal
description: Large car park by the sea. Good alternative for visiting Lisbon as the train station is a 10-minute walk away.  No service.

title: (2780-080) Oeiras - 17 Rua Doutor António José de Almeida
title_short: (2780-080) Oeiras - 17 Rua Doutor António José de Almeida
description: Quiet location with lots of commerce in the region.

address.street: 17 Rua Doutor António José de Almeida

title: (2775) Carcavelos - Avenida Marginal
description: Next to the road and with sea view.

title: (2770) Paço de Arcos - Unnamed Road
description: Abandoned ground. Beach view. Calçadão in front and close / with a view of a beach.

title: (2780-258) Oeiras - 6 Rua de Oeiras do Piauí Brasil
title_short: (2780-258) Oeiras - 6 Rua de Oeiras do Piauí Brasil
description: The car park is about a 10-minute walk from the historic center. It is relatively flat and offers space for larger mobile homes. The train is running nearby, you can hear it quietly. A very basic area but in the center everything is very crowded!

address.street: 6 Rua de Oeiras do Piauí Brasil

title: (2775-028) Parede - 59B Rua Claudina Chamiço
description: Free. I slept here with no problems.

title: (2775-711) Carcavelos - 96 Estrada Alagoa
description: Laundry services inside the Continente grocery store. Public bathrooms around the corner. Hardware store too! Great spot to reset.

title: (2775-757) Carcavelos - 3 Rua Ferreira de Castro
description:
Self-service laundry with 6 tumble dryers and 6 washing machines.

in 1 hour your clothes are washed and dried.

free WiFi

title: (2775-716) Carcavelos - Estrada da Alagoa
description: Gas station with water

title: (2780-416) Oeiras - 12 Rua Coro de Santo Amaro de Oeiras
title_short: (2780-416) Oeiras - 12 Rua Coro de Santo Amaro de Oeiras
description: Directly at the stadium next to the Burger King you can stand very well and fairly quietly.

address.street: 12 Rua Coro de Santo Amaro de Oeiras

title: (2785-158) São Domingos de Rana - 28 Rua Feliciano Moreira
title_short: (2785-158) São Domingos de Rana - 28 Rua Feliciano Moreira
description: Quiet location, lots of commerce.

title: (2770) Paço de Arcos - Avenida Marginal
description: Free parking. NO x motorhome. VIEW of the sea and clearing x download x mount the situation. No toilet no services. Noise from cars but for one night it's ok

title: (2775) Parede - 2 Rua Professor Agostinho da Silva
title_short: (2775) Parede - 2 Rua Professor Agostinho da Silva
description: Very quiet place

title: (2775) Carcavelos - 113 Rua Rio Tua
description: Easy parking in a residential area near the expressway, so some traffic noise. Provides some shade depending on the position of the sun.

title: (2785-741) São Domingos de Rana - 79 Avenida Aristides de Sousa Mendes
title_short: (2785-741) São Domingos de Rana - 79 Avenida Aristides de Sousa Mendes
description: Large car park in front of a Leclerc supermarket with a nice adjacent park with equipment. Gym, bakery, view of the sea, everything is there. We stood here one evening , no problem at all. There are toilets in the market on the right, which is open from 8:30 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. 5G with Meo! The upper parking deck offers additional parking spaces with a view.

title: (2780-268) Oeiras - 23 Rua Raul Indipwo
description: Quiet location, level ground, close to gray water disposal and clean water supply.

title: (2785-599) São Domingos de Rana - Av. Aristides de Sousa Mendes
title_short: (2785-599) São Domingos de Rana - Av. Aristides de Sousa Mendes
description: There is a small washing station between the DIY store (Bricomarché) and the supermarket (Intermarché).

title: (2785) São Domingos de Rana - 396 Estrada Principal do Outeiro
title_short: (2785) São Domingos de Rana - 396 Estrada Principal do Outeiro
description: Quiet place

title: (2785-488) São Domingos de Rana - 49b Rua Vasco da Gama
title_short: (2785-488) São Domingos de Rana - 49b Rua Vasco da Gama
description: Small sweet laundry (detergent included) 16KG, 8 KG laundry. There are also dryers. In addition, very fast free WiFi

title: (2785-696) São Domingos de Rana - 31A Rua Cidade de Tomar
title_short: (2785-696) São Domingos de Rana - 31A Rua Cidade de Tomar
description: Parked for the day, all quiet.

title: (2775) Parede - 3712 Avenida Marginal
description: Parking next to São Pedro do Estoril beach. quiet place, right on the sea, very pleasant. Paid parking between April and September, from 9:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. Free the rest of the year. No services.

title: (2740-031) Porto Salvo - R. António Variações
description: Local próximo a abastecimento de água, descarte de água cinza, descarte de lixo, ao lado de uma pizzaria, lugar calmo e bem nivelado.

title: (2785) São Domingos de Rana - 136A Rua Folias
title_short: (2785) São Domingos de Rana - 136A Rua Folias
description: Big parking, with a lot of lights. Relatively flat, nearby is bakery “Sudoeste” works from 7:30, also 3 min walk is launder-mat. Good place to spend 1 night and continue your journey. Please don’t camp, take your furniture outside and etc, just overnight stay.

title: (2775) Jardins da Parede - 124 Quinta Tainha
description: Nice looking stop, haven't slept there yet, as soon as I do I'll update here

title: (2765) Estoril - 4350 Avenida Marginal
description: Seculo car park in front of BP petrol station

title: (2770) Paço de Arcos - IC15
description: Freeway area 10 minutes from Lisbon. We stayed the night without a problem. The area is a piece of land above the station and from usual car parks. Very calm. A bit noisy with the passage of the highway. Mac do just in front.

title: (2770) - Rua Penedo
description: Gray water release for free just behind the last box for car wash

title: (2785-379) São Domingos de Rana - 120 Largo Manuel Henriques Correia
title_short: (2785-379) São Domingos de Rana - 120 Largo Manuel Henriques Correia
description: I happened to pass by here by bike and there is a free fountain here where you can get good water with canisters or 5L bottles. There are benches and tables in the shade. Parking with the WoMo rather difficult.

title: (2825-897) Trafaria - 210 Avenida António Martins Correia
description: Interesting place more like South America than Europe. It's a small car park near Steam Cove for small vehicles only. Large vans can park at the open area before the local vehicles only sign. Nice beach. Be careful to avoid the slum area to the east if following GPS. Also, don't leave valuables in your van.. Not suitable for overnight as it is close to houses. Support the local cafes!

title: (2765-084) Estoril - 178 Rua Alexandre Herculano
description: Nothing special. But it is a large residential area with avenues where you can stop to rest. If you travel with children there is a park next door.

title: (2825) Trafaria - 143A Avenida António Martins Correia
description: Very accessible site with AC you can see the mouth of the Tagus to the Atlantic, beaches... surely you can sleep.

title: (2785-632) São Domingos de Rana - 74 Rua Mestre Aviz
title_short: (2785-632) São Domingos de Rana - 74 Rua Mestre Aviz
description: A huge unused new car park with bench seats and tables and a BBQ and 2 sinks with running water.

title: (2765) Estoril - 2 Rua Vasco da Gama
description: Single car park. Toilets during the day at the fort next door. free visit of the fort!

title: (1495) Cruz Quebrada - Avenida Pierre de Coubertin
title_short: (1495) Cruz Quebrada - Avenida Pierre de Coubertin
description: Parking next to a sports park with swimming pool and snack bar. Within walking distance in a few minutes to a small beach and a train station (3 stops to Lisbon center). This car park is more suitable for small campers. However, there are several open spaces in the immediate vicinity, even for larger campers, see photos.

title: (2785-318) São Domingos de Rana - 437 Avenida Luís Marcelino
title_short: (2785-318) São Domingos de Rana - 437 Avenida Luís Marcelino
description: Park under trees for a stop in the shade (1:26pm). Located on a street.

title: (2825) Trafaria - Av. António Martins Correia
description: At the end of the Tagus estuary on the left bank. Along the waterfront road.

title: (2825) Trafaria - 149 Avenida António Martins Correia
description: Nice place close to Lisbon to spend a night - relatively calm for à city area . only 4*4 you have to drive bit on the sand . (one side is not very nice but the other side is the beach and part of Lisbon) - you can take the ferry 8 min from here at Trafaria for Lisbon

title: (1495-710) Cruz Quebrada - Estr. da Costa
description: We have been here for 3 days to go to a festival in the Stadium. Quiet place, near a park. Small grocery store nearby. Near the train station, 20 min to Lisbon. Also doable by bike. Safe place. Sufficiently large for a 7m motorhome, a bit uneven.

title: (1495) Cruz Quebrada - Avenida Pierre de Coubertin
title_short: (1495) Cruz Quebrada - Avenida Pierre de Coubertin
description: Fantastic place to do diffrent Sports, about 10 km to town center.

title: (2765-079) Estoril - 35 Avenida Marques Leal
description: Incredible beach view! Fall asleep to the roar of the ocean! This parking lot was perfect for one night (in November). We were not the only camper here but definitely the biggest!  There are showers and toilets on the beach!! Also there are tons of cafes within walking distance.  It was gorgeous!  We didn’t pay because I didn’t even see a parking meter!  The business beside this space was not open and on the other side the building is abandoned.

title: (2765) Estoril - 6925 Rua Olivença
description: Paid parking from 9 am to 8 pm, we park next to the fort at night, little traffic at night, down the ramp is the beach promenade with restaurants

title: (2825) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking space behind the dune. During the day there are many beachgoers and surfers. Lots of noise from beach bars.

title: (2825-450) - 12 Rua Maria de Albergaria
description: Perfect location near the beach. plenty of space and quiet I had a great night

title: (2825-893) Trafaria - 5 Rua Matas Nacionais
description: Directly behind the dunes, also suitable for the large mobile homes. 50 meters to a beautiful and little visited beach. Little wind.

title: (2825-485) - 4B Rua Francisco Ribeiro
description: Quiet parking near the beach.

title: (2645) Alcabideche - 661 Largo Lavadouro
description: Small parking but which helps. Do not have a motorhome too long. Wifi available. Many passages in the morning.

title: (2825-435) - 2 Rua Miguel Torga
description: Shady place where to park and spend the night. Few parking spaces. something noisy Cafeteria that opens at 7 to have breakfast and go to the bathroom

title: (2765-184) Estoril - 17A Avenida General Carmona
description: Paid parking in nice residential area just 5 min walk to the casino.  Make sure you pay, as cops come around and check. Near the little round-about, street is level. If you go further up, parking is free, but we were too lazy to check for a level place. This place may be safer than parking down by the beach. We left the car there for the day. No problem.

title: (2795-134) Linda-a-Velha - 17 Rua Marcelino Mesquita
description: Free roadside parking. Stood here from midday to late at night with no problems. It seemed to me that there was a car & camper rental company that also parked the vehicles there. No prohibition signs seen but no experience with overnight stays. 19 min walk to train station, 4 stops to Lisbon.

name: Camping Orbitur Costa de Caparica
title: (2825-450) Camping Orbitur Costa de Caparica
description: Campsite Orbitur Costa de Caparica. Close to the sea. On site you have a restaurant, snack bar, takeaway food. 28/03 to 30/09 grocery store at 1 km Supermarket at 1 km. On the other hand, no gifts for car carrier or trailer. to visit Lisbon, take the bus near the campsite towards the ferry and you will arrive near the Belem tower.

title: (2825-450) Costa da Caparica - Unnamed Road
description: Public toilets in good condition, very clean with paper.

title: (2825-361) Costa da Caparica - 11 Rua Catarina Eufémia
title_short: (2825-361) Costa da Caparica - 11 Rua Catarina Eufémia
description: Excellent parking, secure, and close to a very large playground, just cross the street and you are on the beach, one of the best we have ever stayed at.

title: (2825) Costa da Caparica - 9 Rua Professor Salazar de Sousa
title_short: (2825) Costa da Caparica - 9 Rua Professor Salazar de Sousa
description: You can take a shower in the surf school (also 'wellness', yoga and massages). The water wasn't that warm (but warm enough for us).

title: (2785) São Domingos de Rana - 95 Rua Santa Eulália
title_short: (2785) São Domingos de Rana - 95 Rua Santa Eulália
description: Super great 360 degree view from here in a quiet residential area.

title: (1495-165) Algés - 1 Rua Alfredo Magalhães Ramalho
description: Lots of calm and peaceful place. near the beach, possibility to walk, run and cycle to the sea line.

title: (2825) Trafaria -
description: Esplanade with good views. We have slept in the car without problems, BE CAREFUL WITH THE ROADS

title: (2825-384) Costa da Caparica - 48D Rua Professor Salazar de Sousa
title_short: (2825-384) Costa da Caparica - 48D Rua Professor Salazar de Sousa
description: From October until May chargeable. Rest of time free parking from 8 p.m. to 8 a.m. in front of the beach and the police station, the night is tolerated. I ask the police and I stay night and day, I paid the fee per day parking, no service. Shops nearby.

title: (2825) Costa da Caparica - 28 Rua Norberto de Araújo
title_short: (2825) Costa da Caparica - 28 Rua Norberto de Araújo
description: Quiet place for day and night along a very quiet street that runs along a huge park. Ideal for a good night and for your dog

title: (1495-165) Algés - 1 Rua Alfredo Magalhães Ramalho
description: Its a nice spot to stay and calma. Nice view the other side of river.

title: (2825) Costa da Caparica - 46B Avenida 1º de Maio
title_short: (2825) Costa da Caparica - 46B Avenida 1º de Maio
description: Free from 7 p.m. to 8 a.m. But choosing a Friday evening in the middle of August was not the right option. We chose this one for the proximity to the beach and restaurant but we found ourselves stuck by the cars then parked around. Night here (very noisy) no choice.

title: (2825-363) Costa da Caparica - 71 Rua Manuel Agro Ferreira
title_short: (2825-363) Costa da Caparica - 71 Rua Manuel Agro Ferreira
description: Calm spot, side by side with a huge green park and 5 min to the beach.

title: (2645) Alcabideche - 6 Estrada Manique
description: Small parking lot in front of the Mcamper garage where it is authorized to spend the night mainly if you have work to do on your motorhome. No drain / fill service, however you can connect to the wifi network with the code 8PWUW32485. The establishment specializes in installing and repairing accessories (satellite dish, solar panels, etc.). Attractive rates!

title: (2635) Rio de Mouro - Av. Dom Antonio Ribeiro
title_short: (2635) Rio de Mouro - Av. Dom Antonio Ribeiro
description: Here at the university in the middle of nowhere we stood in the evening, grilled, sat and spent a night. It's extremely quiet, which is rarely the case around here.

title: (2825) Costa da Caparica - 2A Praceta de Almada
title_short: (2825) Costa da Caparica - 2A Praceta de Almada
description: Parking where buses and vehicles park, entering 5 motorhomes in parallel and another 10 in line. Next to a busy road for vehicles, with very easy access and 10 minutes from the beach.

title: (1495-089) Algés - Avenida Brasília
description: Day parking in a free area to visit the Torre de Belem.

title: (1400-122) Algés - 24B Rua Damião de Góis
description: We parked here as there was nothing better nearby. Lots of car noise but I didn't see it unsafe. We stayed overnight without problem. Leaving the van parked for a whole day, ideal for visiting the Belem tower.

title: (1400) Lisboa - 95 Rua Cordoeiros a Pedrouços
description: Urban parking, close to the main roads. Good for the night. Some noise from the tram and cars.

title: (1400-086) Lisboa -
description: Car parking that allows AC and park where you can spend the night Noisy in the morning by traffic and train

title: (2825-336) Costa da Caparica - 2A Rua António Correia
title_short: (2825-336) Costa da Caparica - 2A Rua António Correia
description: Water tap for free

title: (2735-521) Agualva-Cacém - 55 Rua Cidade de Évora
description: A randomly discovered parking lot with a view. The nearby A37 makes noise, I cooked and ate here and stayed a bit. good for the night ?

title: (2745-740) Queluz - 4 Praceta Cesário Verde
description:
Public car park. Enough space. Nice view. Close to Shopping Massamá.
Somewhat noisy due to the highway and the train line passing by. Tolerable.

title: (2745-838) Queluz - 14 Praceta José Gregório de Almeida
title_short: (2745-838) Queluz - 14 Praceta José Gregório de Almeida
description: Flat parking lot with lots of spaces, right on the outskirts. Quiet area. I had a problem-free night. I didn't take pictures, but you can see it on Google Maps.

title: (1400-038) Lisboa - Largo da Fundação Champalimaud
description: Underground parking fee of the Foundation. Convenient to visit Belem as it is difficult to park nearby.

title: (2750-334) Cascais - 263 Rua Frederico Arouca
description: Paid parking, free at night from 10 p.m. to 9 a.m. Close to everything, 5 minutes from Plaza 5 de octubre. Access to beaches with showers, close to an ocean pool, baths in the beach bars for 20cnts. The nearest beach has a huge inflatable for adults.

title: (2790) Carnaxide - 3 Rua da Mina Grande
description: Nice place to stop for a quick rest near the Municipal Park on Serra de Carnaxide. Walking paths and possibly bike riders. Seems to be secure as i saw a Police car making regular vigilance.

title: (2825-307) Costa da Caparica - 11 Rua Engenheiro Henrique Mêndia
title_short: (2825-307) Costa da Caparica - 11 Rua Engenheiro Henrique Mêndia
description:
Free Park near to fireman, a lot of motorhome parking there without problems. 
Park with light from street.
Near to restaurants, beach, supermarkets..

title: (2825-408) Costa da Caparica - 7 Rua Frei Bartolomeu Assunção
title_short: (2825-408) Costa da Caparica - 7 Rua Frei Bartolomeu Assunção
description: Next to the firemen. Very close to the beach!

title: (2645-117) Alcabideche - 447 Rua das Fisgas
description: Free parking with two lanterns for 20 cars

title: (1400-038) Lisboa - S/N Avenida Brasília
description: Piccola fontana di acqua potabile vicino alla torre di Belem

title: (2750-414) Cascais - 25 Rua Visconde Luz
description: Free public toilets in the park and drinking water fountain.

title: (2750) Cascais - 219 Avenida da República
description: Free parking from 10:00 p.m. to 9:00 a.m. A square attached to a tree so you can park a long AC. Near beach and center (8 minutes walk). Right next to it there is a beautiful park that if you travel with children you should not miss, the bad thing is that in that park there are roosters ... and you know that the roosters get up early.

title: (2645) Alcabideche - 8 Rua do Girassol
description: Clean Self service laundry. Washing 8kg, 11kg, 14kg. Drying 10 minutes

title: (2755-290) Alcabideche - 288A Rua Calçadas
description: Free parking without amenities.

title: (2750-641) Cascais - 130 Rua Pedra da Nau
description: Parking space in a very quiet street near a nice park with games for children and roosters and peacocks. Very quiet except on weekday mornings when city trucks pick up trash. Just a 10 minute walk to Hell's Mouth and a 20 minute walk to the top town center. Free place.

title: (2750-642) Cascais - Rua Padre Moisés da Silva
title_short: (2750-642) Cascais - Rua Padre Moisés da Silva
description: Paid parking from 9h to 20h. Possible nightover

title: (2645-270) Alcabideche - Rua P.Nunes-Feira N.
description: Puplic parking of a running track. We spend the night and felt save, the place is iluminated and people are living by. Some locals passed by with the dogs. No services. Unfortunatly some trash on the ground. Keep it clean!

title: (1400-038) Lisboa - BP Avenida Brasília
description: Quiet place to spend the night

title: (2750-449) Cascais - 22 Rua Nossa Senhora da Assunção
title_short: (2750-449) Cascais - 22 Rua Nossa Senhora da Assunção
description: Esplanade with a little ramp, but accessible, near the center of Cascais and the beaches, here we sleep peacefully

title: (2735-521) Agualva-Cacém - 44 Estrada Vale Mourão
description: Level and good parking for the night. There are 2 businesses adjacent but not busy in the morning. The parking lot is big enough and level and quiet for the night. There is a bus stop.

title: (2755-018) Alcabideche - 1789 Avenida de Sintra
description: Lance washing up to about 7m in length, height not specified - 2.8m have space

title: (2750-135) Cascais - ES Rua São José
description: Small parking about 10 minutes.  Walking distance from the center.  Whether overnight is possible we do not know, there were two more mobile on our departure there.

title: (2750-800) Cascais - 93 Rua Visconde Olivais
description: Residential parking area, right next to Boca do Infierno, and 5 minutes from the museum houses, quiet area. Paid baths 1 minute away. Souvenir shops next to bathrooms and a restaurant. Quiet area to sleep.

title: (2750-400) Cascais - 343 Rua José Florindo
description: Free unpaved but flat parking and about 10 minutes walk from the center of Cascais. There is not much parking, but at nightfall it becomes quite empty. He has no type of service. There is a side street with little traffic, it is not a very noisy place, it is a quiet place, next to a church. A single large tree shades several squares.

title: (2745-191) Queluz - 7 Largo Palácio de Queluz
description:
Large car park in front of the barracks and the palace in the center of Queluz. We slept there 10 days ago, a little noisy because there was a demonstration. Back following a mechanical problem we return to this place for lack of anything better. Right in the center of town, no complaints. I recommend the changing of the guard a little before 8am, really not to be missed.
Ideal for a round trip to LISBON by train to visit the city without parking problems. 2 train stations 15 minutes walk.

title: (1400-297) Lisboa - 5A Rua Pêro da Covilhã
description: Big parking lot, free, we were there alone. Very quiet.

title: (2635-621) Rio de Mouro - 2A Rua Oliva Guerra
title_short: (2635-621) Rio de Mouro - 2A Rua Oliva Guerra
description: Laundromat with 3 washing machines a 9, 12 & 16 kg, as well as 2 dryers a 16 kg. WiFi available. The launderette also has an ironing service and a sewing shop. Waiting area with sofa, relax chairs and tables. Parking opposite the salon. There is also a playground and a fenced dog run area.

title: (2750-398) Cascais - 87 Rua Dom José de Avilez
title_short: (2750-398) Cascais - 87 Rua Dom José de Avilez
description: Road where the parking lot is free.

title: (2750-800) Cascais - 1 Rua Visconde Olivais
description: Parking next to the Rocha de Inferno, 3 euro for 3.5 hours, paid from 9 to 22. safe place to leave your camper and walk to the city center

title: (2635-621) Rio de Mouro - 41 Rua Sidónio Muralha
title_short: (2635-621) Rio de Mouro - 41 Rua Sidónio Muralha
description: Great laundry next door with couch and wifi. Since it was getting late to do the laundry, we decided to sleep in the opposite parking lot. The parking lot is crooked. Playground is right next door. Overall we had a quiet night.

title: (1400-015) Lisboa - 67 Rua António Saldanha
description: Quite ample parking away from the downtown area but in a very quiet neighborhood, several AC and campers were there too.

title: (2645-543) Alcabideche - 112 Rua Terceira Idade
description: Visited the circuit here and stayed one night. Great view of the race track during the day. The parking lot is a bit busy at night, but it was never noisy.

title: (2825-109) Almada - 13 Rua Bento de Jesus Caraça
title_short: (2825-109) Almada - 13 Rua Bento de Jesus Caraça
description: Place in fishing village opposite Lisbon, for small campers and vans. Be full of cars during the day, in the morning and in the evening. Around 12 the road was completely quiet, but lit up and I felt very safe there. Take the ferry 5 min to the other side, 8 min train to cais do sodre and you are in the middle of Lisbon. Sleeping in peace, walking in the city ;)

title: (2825-412) Costa da Caparica - R. Praia da Saúde
title_short: (2825-412) Costa da Caparica - R. Praia da Saúde
description: I have not tried the place, but is seems like a good spot, next to camper places, so one night with Avan will not distrub anyone

title: (2750-642) Cascais - 17 Avenida Vigia do Facho
description: good place to sleep

title: (2750-642) Cascais - 1009 Avenida da República
description: Free parking space, without services, but in a safe area. Lots of traffic noise, but I didn't find anything else around here. 20 minutes from the center on foot.

title: (1400-195) Lisboa - 24A Rua Gregório Lopes
description: Parking next to a vet we spent 2 days here because our dog was veterinarian sick at 200 meters this vet was competent and super nice in fact it is a pet hospital. Noisy but super cool and right next to the car pound we asked the municipal police if we could stay there we said no worries free parking

title: (2825) Costa da Caparica - 22 Rua Frei Bartolomeu Assunção
title_short: (2825) Costa da Caparica - 22 Rua Frei Bartolomeu Assunção
description: Parking between two campsites, in front of the beach. At night it is quiet and there are no cars or noise, but in the morning cars begin to arrive from people who go to the beach. It is good to spend a quiet night and take advantage of the day on the beach.

title: (2750-642) Cascais - 162 Avenida Pedro Álvares Cabral
description: Very nice longitudinal parking spaces. Suitable for any size. Next to it is a guarded residential area. Very quiet day/night. Centrally located

title: (1400-903) Lisboa - Rua Luís Castanho de Almeida
title_short: (1400-903) Lisboa - Rua Luís Castanho de Almeida
description: Shadows and quiet

title: (2645-640) Alcabideche - 58b Rua do Verde Mar
description: Pretty big parking lot. It's right on the street, but it didn't bother us because there wasn't much traffic. There is a cafe nearby. It's ok for one night.

title: (2750-390) Cascais - 18 Travessa Joaquim Ereira
description: Very clean laundromat. . I recommend! There is a parking lot right in front so very convenient

title: (2794-057) Carnaxide - N 49 E Avenida dos Cavaleiros
title_short: (2794-057) Carnaxide - N 49 E Avenida dos Cavaleiros
description: Quiet place, parking lot of an apartment store, it is always empty, in the shade of trees (Portuguese)

title: (1400-206) Lisboa - Praça do Império
description: Being able to park in the cordon there was a valet in the afternoon I gave him the permit and here he left the caravan all night, I also asked a policeman and he told us that only the municipal police did. Saw a warning and penalty incident, had no problem parking besides the spectacular views

title: (2790) Carnaxide - Rua Quinta do Salrego
description: Slightly hilly, but great to park close to Jumbo to go shopping.

title: (1400-038) Lisbon - Praça do Império
description: Drinking fountain right on the edge of the pavement, easy to park next to. good pressure. I was able to fill my reservoir with a rubber. It does not have a hose connection. It is next to the Jerónimos Monastery.

title: (2750-374) Cascais - 1407 Avenida Rei Humberto II de Itália
title_short: (2750-374) Cascais - 1407 Avenida Rei Humberto II de Itália
description: On street parking near to Boca do Inferno. The street is huge and can accommodate large vehicles. Thete are toilets and a water tap at Boca do Inferno. There is a cycle route into central Cascais and also to Guincho which is about 8km from Cascais. Lovely cycle for all abilities along the coast. It's possible to get the train from Cascais to Lisbon.

address.street: 1407 Avenida Rei Humberto II de Itália

title: (2750-801) Cascais -
description: Useful place to fill in water. I dont use it to drink, but for shower and dishes is fine water. Very fast filling, up to 2 min. They have the normal water beside the air section, but the fast filling water is right next to this section, is a green hose.

title: (1400-206) Lisboa - 8A Largo dos Jerónimos
description: Trinkwasser. Perfekt

title: () -
description: Washing machines at Intermarché, 2 units, cash only with change

title: (2825) Costa da Caparica - Unnamed Road
description: Along the sand dunes, the sea just behind ideal for children! small train that stops 100 meters to move in town perfect big CC to maneuver attention arrive from 19 / 20h because during the day the car park is full parking of sands restaurant and bar nearby

title: (2710-089) Sintra - 69 Rua Forno
description: Quiet location overlooking the Sintra mountains. Only in the morning can you hear cars passing on the main road.

title: (2710-323) Sintra - 2 N9
description:
Laundromat at the gas station:
-  8kg 4euro
- 18kg 8euro
- drier 20min 2euro

there is also drinking water but NOT possibility of gardena connector.

title: (2710-089) Sintra - 6 Rua Nova Esperança
description: Parking space in a residential area.

title: (1300-014) Lisboa - 96 Praça Afonso de Albuquerque
description: Public toilets free open during the day.

title: (2750) Cascais - 206 Rua Caravelas
description: Free parking 5 minutes from downtown

title: (2735-521) Agualva-Cacém - 5A Travessa Ribeira
description: Simple Parking Area near the town. No problems in the night, maybe to small for long camper cars.

title: (2750-762) Cascais - Rua da Torre
description: Quiet place near a restaurant beats the 10 open until 2 am. Good welcome

title: (2825) Costa da Caparica - Unnamed Road
description: Parking Praia riviera

title: (2750-768) Cascais - 2108 Rua Joaquim Ereira
description: Galp gas, refills German gas bottles. You have to deliver the bottles and wait 3-4 days.

title: (1300-338) Lisboa - 270A Rua da Junqueira
description:
Automatic laundry with 3 machines of 8/12/ and 16 kg, and drying.
it is only possible to pay in cash.

title: (1300-300) Lisboa - 110 Avenida da Índia
description: Good parking lot, but it was broken into. Better to choose a decent motorhome parking space in Lisbon. very dangerous were only gone during the day for 5 hours!

title: (1300-040) Lisboa - 12B Rua Alfredo da Silva
description: Parking lot near supermarket and local market. Several motorhomes in the place. Some just parked but others with people inside. It has public transports nearby that access directly downtown.

title: (1300) Lisboa - 22 Rua da Torre
description: Huge parking lot, no signs to not sleep at night

title: (2725-397) Sintra - 4 Rua Francisco Lyon de Castro
title_short: (2725-397) Sintra - 4 Rua Francisco Lyon de Castro
description:
Laundry station with dryer directly in the Auchan shopping store.
Washing machines with 9 kilos & 14 kilos. Dryer with a capacity of 17 kilos.

name: Lisboa Camping
title: (1400) Lisboa Camping
description: Ambient noise (aircraft, highway); sanitary facilities available; direct bus connection to the city of Lisbon (line 714; about 45 min.) Very loud music from the concert area.

title: (2750) Cascais - 10B Rua dos Eucaliptos
description: It's a gas station. This is the repsol gas station.

title: (2750) Cascais - 125 Rua dos Eucaliptos
description: Parking to visit the area (near climbing routes), inclined. Residential area.

title: (2750-269) Cascais - 420 N9-1
description: Here at the gas station there is a large and clean toilet. free of charge. The name is "Tangerine". I'm not sure - think there is gas from Galp here too. There is also a car wash, vacuum cleaner and air for the wheels.

title: (2710) Sintra - 12 Estrada da Lagoa Azul
description: Place a little lower than the other which helps if it is complete. We pass there two vans, flat ground, near a road but very little passing.

title: (2710-144) Sintra - 2A Rua Quinta Nova
description: Parking at the edge of the national. Near Sintra (4 / 5kms) we spent the night and the day, not seen any sign prohibiting parking.

title: (1300) Lisboa - Avenida Universidade Técnica
description: Big parking lot next to some faculties. Might have little spot to park during the day but it's usually empty at night. Super close to Palácio da Ajuda, some other monuments and with good public transportation system during the day. Has an entry to Tapada da Ajuda and Its almost in the heart of Monsanto florestal park.

title: (1300-598) Lisbon - Av. Brasília
description: Water spring. It works with a canister.

title: (2700-317) Amadora - 35 Rua Henrique Nogueira
description: Great place to visit Lisbon. You can arrived the city center in 15min by train. The place is great, but just for one night, because of residential area. It is quiet at night and there is lighting, on weekends it can be noisy from the football field nearby. Only for small vans that fit in a regular parking space

title: (1300) Lisboa -
description: excellent site

title: (2825) Costa da Caparica - Unnamed Road
description: Parking praia castello

title: (2750-005) Cascais - 1108 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Cabo
title_short: (2750-005) Cascais - 1108 Avenida Nossa Senhora do Cabo
description: Small parking right on the rocks. Unfortunately, the majority of the place is a bit sloping, in front is a flat place, but only accessible with a campervan.

title: (2710-144) Sintra - Rua Minarvela
description: A forest road used by mountain bikers. Absolute calm and sheltered from the wind. There were bursts at 90km / h when we came to spend the night here

title: (2710-144) Sintra - Rua Minarvela
description: A quiet area in the shade of the trees. It took us forever to find such a quiet place in this region. Good for large Iveco vans, etc., but not for large motorhomes. Access is good with only a few soft hanging limbs. Forbidden to stay at night

title: (2710) Sintra -
description: Very quiet and level place, especially for 4x4 or similar, motorhomes difficult to access, we spent the night without any problem.

title: (2710) Sintra - Unnamed Road
description: Small quiet corner ideal for parking a van. Several places along the road, a first place before a stony hill (pay attention to the ground clearance...), a second place in the sun in the morning on a bend, and a third at the entrance to two hiking trails . If you continue along the road, you will come across private property. We just passed two runners in the morning..

title: (2710) Sintra - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful location 50 meters from the blue lagoon, accessible via a bumpy path. Nice quiet place in the shelter of the wind with a beautiful view.

title: (2820-266) Charneca de Caparica - R. do Cassapo
title_short: (2820-266) Charneca de Caparica - R. do Cassapo
description: Is only a public road that is little used. Suitable for a relatively quiet night. Between nature reserve and upscale residential district. A quiet parking space might not be so easy to find in the area especially at the weekend, due to the many clubs on the beach. you can still hear a bit the basses, but it is absolutely ok. Other places in this area around the water tower and the small stadium are likely to work.

title: (2710) Sintra -
description: Forest where you will find several places to park or spend the night. The place where we are is quite dirty, but you can put yourself on the opposite side of the rubbish. Several vehicles can park and it is quite flat. Very little network and wind when we were there. Good for one night but not for resting during the day, because noisy racing circuit very close.

title: (2700-064) Amadora - 52 Estrada da Falagueira
description: Service point Campingaz (exchange gas bottle Butane)

title: (2710) Sintra -
description: Sheltered from the wind and view, flat ground on a wide path very little used given the brush, perfect?

title: (2605) Belas - Unnamed Road
description: Park close to the Mira Sintra- Melecas station

title: (2710-689) Sintra -
description: Parking with an esplanade that can fit 30 vehicles. We had just been sleeping in nature when the civil guard told us that we had to leave and recommended this place to us, so it is acceptable to spend the night here. Yes there is wind.

title: (1500) Lisboa - 1 Vila Guiné
description: Picnic area, Water for cleaning dishes. Barbecue site visited by locals and tourists. Quiet

title: (2710-116) Sintra - 2 Rua César de Oliveira
description: Washers and dryers of various sizes. Wash and dry well. Clothes come out smelling great.

title: (2825) Costa da Caparica - Estrada Florestal
description: Parking praia Pescador

title: (1300) Lisbon -
description: Parking lot below the highway, relatively noisy, was safe during the day and overnight. In the morning, if you ask nicely, you can take a shower at the tennis club right next door.

title: (2750) Cascais - Estrada Nova
description: Parking in front of houses but as an emergency place ok

title: (2700) Amadora - Tv. da Quinta do Pau
title_short: (2700) Amadora - Tv. da Quinta do Pau
description: Big parking lot, across the free park. Road on te parking lot is very bumpy with a lot of holes. Drive slow. One minute walk to the Metro and busses which take you to Lisbon centre.

title: (2710) Sintra - Unnamed Road
description: Small, simple pitch next to a body of water (I don't know if fishing is allowed), I spent the night without incident. The path is a bit chaotic, but I did it with no problem with my berlingo.

title: (2710) Sintra - Unnamed Road
description: Pretty clearing of mid-high grass, very calm and pleasant. Or how to feel in the middle of nature close to civilization and the Palais Nationnal. The place is perfect, thanks to the next ones for leaving it as clean as you found it ... Reserved for 4x4 vehicles, no particular difficulties but a short climb on the track and a thick grass will prevent access to any other type vehicle.

title: (1300) Lisboa -
description: A nice park to walk around and to make picnics... It has tables, games for children, skate parks, trails and even agility parks for dogs with water fountains arranged for our friends 4 legs.

title: () Sintra - 21 N9
description: Good for parking during the day, free, but we spent the night in the next parking, as it seemed safer. There's public toilets and drinking water, but not suitable for tank filling. Emptying services non-existent.

title: (1300) Lisboa - Estrada do Alvito
description:
Free park for day and night
great place to children play. great park
near of goods routes to walk by foot or with bycicle. good places to practice a great kind of sport. look at satellite view and know Monsanto. It's a peaceful nature on the city

title: (1300) Lisboa - 1300 Rua Professor Vieira Natividade
description: Quiet at night, enough space but not officially a parking space.

title: (1300) Lisboa - 1 Rua Marquês de Pombal
description: Free park for day and night with a pool in the neighborhood 5 minutes walking of a point of view and of the Monsanto, real peacefully place to practice a great variation of sports, look at satellite view to know Monsanto

title: (1300-054) Lisboa - Estr. Alvito
description: On a road, surrounded by the forest and with a busstation 5 minutes away

title: (2805) Almada - Avenida José Cardoso Pires
description: Located opposite the entrance to Lisbon, take the bridge over the mouth, take the first right on the fast lane then right again after the petrol station. indication of Christo. is turning right at the roundabout, just before going over the bridge lane. 10 minutes walk to the monument of Christ.

title: (2825) Costa da Caparica - Unnamed Road
description: Large Praias do Reis and Princessa car parks

title: (1300-553) Lisboa - 103 Rua Rodrigues de Faria
description: The parking lot next to the LX factory. 2 euros per day and no official height limit but some lines at the entrance. You can push it up and you'll be fine.

description: Petit parking à l’abri des regard près d’une route. Très calme la nuit

title: (1300) Lisboa -
description: Super parking for the day for the night I do not know because it is just below the bridge and the crossing of 2 big roads .... but to go to LX factory is ideal. and we have nothing to pay and nothing is to indicate.

title: (1500-339) Lisboa - 46 Alameda Padre Álvaro Proença
description: A free park on a hill with many winding paths, multiple drinking-water points, a picnic area, café and some activities close to a parking area that could be used overnight if used discreetly.

title: (2805) Almada - Avenida José Cardoso Pires
description: Gravel place without any signage, but there are cars parked there all day long. Ground noise level is quite high by the highway in the immediate vicinity. I would not want to spend the night here, but to explore the city on foot the parking was good.

title: (1300-054) Lisbon - Estr. do Clube de Ténis
title_short: (1300-054) Lisbon - Estr. do Clube de Ténis
description: Free spacious parking near the road. Not very clean but it’s ok. Bus stop to go to the center (you need to change to metro after) is 7 minutes by walk. Our night was calm. Even if it is near the road, during the night it was quiet.

title: (1300-370) Lisboa - 2 Rua Padre Adriano Botelho
description: 'Balneário público de Alcântara' Free public showers for men and women. Open 7h30-12h00 Wednesday - Saturday. There is a toilet and shower cubicles and benches. Cubicles are large, the water is hot and has good pressure. They can provide you with a towel, soap and shampoo and clothes for free if needed.

title: (2755) Alcabideche - 1514 Estrada da Serra
description: Quiet places for a siest, we can not spend the night.
